entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
